description: A hardy plant that purifies indoor air and thrives in low light. Perfect for beginners and busy plant parents. Known for its striking upright leaves with yellow edges.
The iconic Swiss Cheese Plant with stunning split leaves. A statement piece that brings tropical vibes to any room. Loves bright indirect light.
Elegant white blooms and glossy dark leaves. Excellent air purifier and thrives in low light. Tells you when it needs water by drooping slightly.
A showstopper with large, violin-shaped leaves. Popular among interior designers for its dramatic presence. Requires consistent care and bright light.
Beautiful trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves splashed with golden yellow. Nearly impossible to kill. Perfect for shelves and hanging baskets.
Bold, burgundy-tinted leaves that add drama to any space. Excellent air purifier and low maintenance. Grows into an impressive indoor tree.
Virtually indestructible with glossy, waxy leaves. Tolerates low light and irregular watering. Modern aesthetic perfect for offices and dim corners.
Stunning banana-like leaves that create an instant tropical paradise. Can grow up to 6 feet indoors. Needs bright light and regular watering.
